Articles.Content: Hi - I'm looking at potentially forking a tech tree (either Probes before Crew or Kiwi Tech Tree) as the basis for a new tech tree mod I'm going to be trying to create. From what I understand, it seems like I'm technically all clear to fork the mods  or borrow things from them, so long as I give credit, as they are both under the MIT License, but I figured I'd check here first just to make sure there aren't any other rules, policies, or just general advice people have before doing so. Anyone got any advice?

53 minutes ago, CessnaSkyhawk said:

Anyone got any advice?

Always nice to get the original author's OK to fork, or at least let them know you are doing so.  It's not required under MIT, but it's a polite and neighbourly thing to do.
